types.$Port.properties.error.description: If the port was disconnected due to an error, this will be set to an object with a string property message, giving you more information about the error. See onDisconnect.

types.$Port.properties.postMessage.name: postMessage
types.$Port.properties.postMessage.description: Send a message to the other end. This takes one argument, which is a JSON object representing the message to send. It will be delivered to any script listening to the port's onMessage event, or to the native application if this port is connected to a native application.

events.%onMessage.returns.description: Return a Promise from the listener function and resolve the promise when the response is ready.

events.%onMessageExternal.returns.description: Return a Promise from the listener function and resolve the promise when the response is ready.
